intro.title: Welcome to the Archipelago
intro.description: You awaken on a peaceful island, your Personal Island. An unfamiliar voice calls out: Welcome, adventurer. Your journey across the Archipelago awaits.

islands.name: Personal Island
islands.description: A quiet and serene place where your journey begins. You can build and expand this island as you progress.

npcs.name: Jerry
npcs.dialogue: Welcome to your Personal Island. I’m Jerry, your guide. Let’s start your adventure!

islands.name: Hub Island
islands.description: The bustling center of the Archipelago. Merchants and adventurers gather here to trade and prepare for journeys to other islands.

npcs.name: Quest-Giver
npcs.dialogue: Ah, a new face! I have tasks for you. Start small and build your strength.

npcs.name: Wolf Slayer
npcs.dialogue: The wolves of this land are cursed, spreading chaos. Hunt them, and I’ll share their secrets. Bring me their pelts, and I’ll tell you more.

npcs.name: Bazaar Keeper
npcs.dialogue: Welcome to the Bazaar. I’ll take anything you’ve gathered and turn it into coin.

islands.name: Mining Island
islands.description: A rugged island rich in resources. Adventurers come here to mine valuable ores.

npcs.name: Miner
npcs.dialogue: Welcome to the Mining Island. Pick up a tool and start digging!

islands.name: Farming Island
islands.description: A peaceful island where crops thrive. Perfect for earning gold through farming.

npcs.name: Farmer
npcs.dialogue: Take these seeds and start farming. It’s rewarding work!

islands.name: Combat Island
islands.description: A dangerous island filled with monsters. Only the brave venture here to earn great rewards.

npcs.name: Spider Slayer
npcs.dialogue: The spiders here are ancient and venomous. Their silk holds secrets of strength. Bring me their silk, and I’ll weave a tale for you.

monsters.name: Skeleton
monsters.description: A deadly archer with unerring aim.

monsters.name: Spider
monsters.description: A venomous predator hiding in the shadows.

islands.name: End Island
islands.description: A mysterious island shrouded in darkness. Legends speak of a powerful dragon that guards the secrets of the End.

npcs.name: Ender Scholar
npcs.dialogue: The Ender Dragon is a formidable foe. Prepare yourself before entering its domain.

npcs.name: Relic Keeper
npcs.dialogue: Relics from the End hold great power. Bring me Ender Pearls, and I’ll trade them for something special.

monsters.name: Enderman
monsters.description: A tall, shadowy figure that teleports unpredictably.

boss.name: Ender Dragon
boss.description: The ultimate challenge. Defeat it to claim glory and treasure.
